title: 【AK Texture】AK材质包【1.13/1.14/1.15/1.16】【16x】
author: 爱心魔王FHC
txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱心魔王FHC 于 2021-1-23 09:47 编辑 


AK材质包This pack modifies a lot of blocks (ores, obsidian, tables, glass), items (weapons, tools, ender items, ores), sounds (doors, chest and damage) and the user interface. The hostile mobs eyes, the crosshair, and other things are modified (no sound pistons and Netherite tools to :-). If you like to see other things that are modified then download it and check for yourself!作者：Adrikadh图片展示Did you like to have a better experience in Minecraft vanilla? This pack modified the minecraft texture default to get better gameplay:
你想要在原版MC有更好的体验吗，材质包的以下修改也许可以让你获得更好的游戏体验：

Custom Sky
全新的天空

Minecraft hostile mobs lighting eyes
敌对生物发光的眼睛

Better minerals ( blocks and ores )
更好的矿物（矿物块和矿）

Custom tools and weapons
全新的的工具和武器



Different birch leaves ( auttumn design )
不一样的白桦树树叶

Clean glass
更清晰的玻璃

Invisible item frames
透明的物品展示框

Clean leather armor
更整洁的皮革装



Custom ender pearls , ender eyes and end end portal frame
全新的的末影珍珠，末影之眼和末地传送框架

Custom doors ( with sounds and textures )
全新的的门（带有材质和声音）

Custom XP bar, crossair and ui
全新的经验条、准心和GUI



Different damage sounds
不同的受伤声音

No-Sound Pistons
没有活塞声音

Custom end portal, nether bricks and fire
全新的末地门、地狱砖和火



Red obsidian
红色的黑曜石

Netherite tools and ingot was redesign
下届工具和ingot（暂时没有标准译名）被重新设计

And more different changes
还有更多不同的设计









Custom Skies
自定义天空



Better minerals ( blocks and ores )
更好的矿物和矿物块



Custom tools and weapons
自定义的工具和武器





Clean glass
干净的玻璃



Clean leather armor
干净的皮革盔甲



Custom ender pearls , ender eyes and end end portal frame
自定义的末地门、末地之眼和末地传送门框架





Custom Ui, heart and food containers, crossair, colour of bottons, splashes and Xp bar
自定义的UI，血条和食物条、准心、按钮的颜色、经验条、闪烁标语







Changes in the Pig and the Sheep
修改了小猪和小羊的材质



Custom Nether Portal
自定义的地狱传送门



Underwater views
水下



Connected stones
石头的连接



Nether Updated
地狱更新



Custom iron miscellaneous
自定义的铁



Netherite tools, ingots and totem was redesign
地狱工具，铸锭和不死图腾


Different sounds, in doors, anvils, chests and pistons
门、铁砧、箱子和活塞有了不同的声音

And more different changes
还有更多不同的改变



Changelog panel
修改日志面板





On PvP version you have alot of changes in blocks, items and miscellaneous, you can see if you download this pack!
PVP版本的材质包在方块、物品等杂项上有很多的变化



其他更多图片



































材质分辨率16x支持的版本1.13/1.14/1.15/1.16下载链接: https://pan.baidu.com/s/1yYRorBw4Vxj7lDQPqBxtSQ
提取码: AKTP
